rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0001
rows.name:
It's good to see a few more smiling
faces for a change... Our friends here,
the people in the capital...

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0002
rows.name: Yup. Real bunch of do-gooders, we are.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0004
rows.name:
That's just the Iiran way. Human and
Blade, side by side, in perfect harmony.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0006
rows.name:
It's kinda rare too. I doubt you'd find
another country that values human
and Blade bonds so highly.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0007
rows.name: This is the impression that you have...?

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0008
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi, you're a national treasure. A
high-end Blade,
admired by the commonfolk.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0009
rows.name:
So maybe you're a little bit sheltered
from these realities...

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0010
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi's a precious pansy,
hovering above the clouds.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0011
rows.name:
...Quite. And, if I may venture, that must
be doubly so for mighty Grail.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0013
rows.name: Hey. Cut it out, you two!

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0014
rows.name: OK, Prince. So what's our next move?

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0015
rows.name:
We should return to the palace and
see if there's any new intelligence
concerning Metsu's movements.

rows.label: campfev11_2800_msg0017
rows.name:
I'm sure Marveni's information is
correct. But I'm a little curious as to
why he hasn't moved yet.
